long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate QR Codes Instantly for Any Website!

Turn any webpage into a scannable QR code with a single click! This lightweight and easy-to-use Chrome extension allows you to quickly share links with others by creating QR codes directly from the website you're on.

How It Works:

Open a webpage you want to share.
Click the extension icon in your browser.
Instantly generate a QR code for the current URL.
Scan the QR code with any mobile device to access the link.
How It Helps You:

Quick Sharing: Easily share web links with friends, family, or colleagues without the need to type or copy URLs.
Mobile-Friendly: Perfect for accessing long or complex URLs on your phone or tablet.
Convenient for Presentations: Display QR codes during meetings or presentations for audience engagement.
Save Time: No need to rely on external QR code generators â€“ everything happens right in your browser.
This extension is a must-have for anyone looking to simplify link sharing and enhance productivity. Download now and experience seamless sharing at your fingertips!
